metadata.title: CVE-2017-16898 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The printMP3Headers function in util/listmp3.c in libming v0.4.8 or earlieris vulnerable to a global buffer overflow, which may allow attackers tocause a denial of service via a crafted file, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2016-9264.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
